description:
Hotel Dan Inn Uberaba & Convenções offers air-conditioned accommodation, buffet breakfast, free Wi-Fi and a baby cot upon availability. Located at the entrance to Uberaba, close to the BR-050 highway, the hotel is ideal for your stay, whether for business or leisure.

Located amidst a vast green area, the hotel offers several leisure options for the whole family, including 2 swimming pools, football and volleyball courts, gym and playground. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a telephone, ensuring comfort and practicality. Cribs are available subject to availability.

Our restaurant opens from 12pm, serving delicious homemade pastries and typical dishes from the region. Additionally, we offer afternoon coffee from 2pm to 5pm. Guests can enjoy drinks by the pool or relax with a relaxed happy hour at the American Bar. For your convenience, room service is available 24 hours a day, with a special menu of broths, soups and snacks from 11pm to 3am.

The Hotel Dan Inn Uberaba & Convenções offers a delicious breakfast from 5am to 10am, from Monday to Sunday, including holidays. We are located 1 km from the Exhibition Park, 3 km from Uberaba Airport and 5 km from the center of Uberaba.

Your pet is warmly welcomed at Dan Inn Uberaba. We offer pet-friendly accommodation upon prior consultation and compliance with our internal rules. Extra costs may apply.

Come and enjoy a comfortable and unforgettable experience at the Hotel Dan Inn Uberaba & Convenções!
